page.title: 18Lesson Time
page.content: I am{six}years old, and in{Class 2. My school day lasts from{9:00am}to {3:30pm.}At school we learn to read and write.{Writing}is a card or book with sentences to write. We write our own {stories}too. Once we listened to a piece of music. It reminded me of a picture in my encyclopaedia of animals. When it is{handwriting}we do our best writing. We do{number work. Best of all I like hundreds, tens and units. We do topics about things like {Autumn,}the{Egyptians,}the{Normans}and our{village. P.E.}is fun. Sometimes we have bean bags between our feet and try to jump. We have{music}twice a week and do{painting}and{sewing.}We made big dragons last week. We used paint, material, paper, wool and all sorts of oddments.
